#summary Molehill Drop 10 limitations.
#labels molehill,limitations

= Introduction =

A few notes about limitations in the Molehill API. Might change in future Molehill API versions.

= Details =

Max vertices per vertex buffer: 65535 <br>
Max indices per index buffer: 524287 <br>
Max num of vertex buffers: 4096, 256mb <br>
Max num of index buffers: 4096, 128mb <br>
Max textures: 4096, 512mb </br>
Max cube textures: 4096, 256mb <br>
Max programs: 4096, 16mb <br>
Max draw calls per present: 32768 <br>
